Detailed Description

a Function is a mathematical function f: R^3 -> R^4, evaluated on a 3-dimensional grid, together with methods to rotate and translate the grid in 4-space, to project the transformed grid onto 3-space, and to draw the projected grid into an OpenGL display list.

abstract member:

  • Vector &f (double, double, double); virtual members:
  • Vector *df (double, double, double);
  • Vector &normal (double, double, double);
